name: AVAssetWriterDelegate
desc: A delegate protocol that defines the methods to implement to respond to asset-writing events.

items.name: func assetWriter(AVAssetWriter, didOutputSegmentData: Data, segmentType: AVAssetSegmentType)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the asset writer output segment data.

items.name: func assetWriter(AVAssetWriter, didOutputSegmentData: Data, segmentType: AVAssetSegmentType, segmentReport: AVAssetSegmentReport?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the asset writer output segment data and a report.

items.name: class AVAssetSegmentReport
items.desc: An object that provides information about segment data.
